title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5004.1 - General requirements for all loans
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5004.1 - General requirements for all loans

State Regulations
(a) All applications for loans shall be made
on forms approved and provided by the system. (b) Any member who is credited with at least
one year of service may apply for a loan. (c) The unpaid balance of any defaulted loan
must be fully repaid. (d) Nothing in
this Part shall authorize or require the system to make a loan which is not
permitted under the applicable provisions of the Internal Revenue

Code. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5004.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
